languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}Трясущийся от ужаса и почтения{/d} человечек низко кланяется вам.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, слава Императору! Вы, быть может, и не помните меня совсем..." {n}Мужчина с клочковатой бородой, кажется, очень на это надеется.{/n} "Я из негоциантов Пустотного Братства... вашей милостью при Футфоле выжившем..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Трясущийся от ужаса человечек низко кланяется вам.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, слава Императору! Вы, быть может, и не помните меня совсем..." {n}Мужчина с клочковатой бородой, кажется, очень на это надеется.{/n} "Я из негоциантов Пустотного Братства... вашей милостью при Футфоле выжившем..."
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}A man with a scraggly beard bows deeply to you, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}shaking with terror and awe{/d}.{/n} "Glory to the Emperor, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! You might not remember me at all..." {n}He seems to really hope that is the case.{/n} "I'm a merchant from the Fellowship of the Void... which has survived on and around Footfall by your good graces..."
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}Трясущийся от ужаса и почтения{/d} человечек низко кланяется вам.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, слава Императору! Вы, быть может, и не помните меня совсем..." {n}Мужчина с клочковатой бородой, кажется, очень на это надеется.{/n} "Я из негоциантов Пустотного Братства... вашей милостью при Футфоле выжившем..."

traits.locale_text: {n}A man with a scraggly beard bows deeply to you, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}shaking with terror and awe{/d}.{/n} "Glory to the Emperor, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! You might not remember me at all..." {n}He seems to really hope that is the case.{/n} "I'm a merchant from the Fellowship of the Void... which has survived on and around Footfall by your good graces..."
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}一个满脸胡茬的男人向你深鞠一躬，浑身颤抖着，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}充满了恐惧与敬畏{/d}。{/n}“帝皇在上，大人！或许您已经不记得我了……”{n}他听起来似乎真的很希望你不记得他。{/n}“我是来自虚空协联的商人……在您的恩典之下，我还活着，在落脚港扎了根……”
languages.original_text: {n}A man with a scraggly beard bows deeply to you, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}shaking with terror and awe{/d}.{/n} "Glory to the Emperor, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! You might not remember me at all..." {n}He seems to really hope that is the case.{/n} "I'm a merchant from the Fellowship of the Void... which has survived on and around Footfall by your good graces..."

traits.locale_text: {n}一个满脸胡茬的男人向你深鞠一躬，浑身颤抖着，充满了恐惧与敬畏。{/n}“帝皇在上，大人！或许您已经不记得我了……”{n}他听起来似乎真的很希望你不记得他。{/n}“我是来自虚空协联的商人……在您的恩典之下，我活了下来，在落脚港扎了根……”
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}無精髭を生やした男は、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}恐怖と畏怖に体を震わせ{/d}ながらも深々と頭を下げた。{/n}「皇帝に栄光を、陛下。あなたは私を覚えていないと思いますが…」{n}彼は、そうであることを期待しているようだった。{/n}「私は虚空の仲間の商人です…あなたのご好意のお陰で、フットフォールとその周辺で、生き延びてこれました…」
languages.original_text: {n}A man with a scraggly beard bows deeply to you, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}shaking with terror and awe{/d}.{/n} "Glory to the Emperor, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! You might not remember me at all..." {n}He seems to really hope that is the case.{/n} "I'm a merchant from the Fellowship of the Void... which has survived on and around Footfall by your good graces..."

traits.locale_text: {n}無精髭を生やした男は、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}恐怖と畏怖に体を震わせ{/d}ながらも深々と頭を下げた。{/n}「皇帝に栄光を、陛下。あなたは私を覚えていないと思いますが…」{n}彼は、そうであることを期待しているようだった。{/n}「私は虚空の仲間の商人です…あなたのご好意のお陰で、フットフォールとその周辺で、生き延びてこれました…」
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}Un hombre de barba desaliñada se inclina profundamente ante ti, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}temblando de miedo{/d}.{/n} «¡Gloria al Emperador, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Puede que no me recuerde...». {n}Parece esperar que sea así.{/n} «Soy un mercader de la Hermandad del Vacío... que ha sobrevivido en Paso gracias a usted...».
languages.original_text: {n}A man with a scraggly beard bows deeply to you, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}shaking with terror and awe{/d}.{/n} "Glory to the Emperor, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! You might not remember me at all..." {n}He seems to really hope that is the case.{/n} "I'm a merchant from the Fellowship of the Void... which has survived on and around Footfall by your good graces..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un hombre de barba desaliñada se inclina profundamente ante ti, temblando de miedo.{/n} «¡Gloria al Emperador, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Puede que no me recuerde...». {n}Parece esperar que sea así.{/n} «Soy un mercader de la Hermandad del Vacío... que ha sobrevivido en Paso gracias a usted...».
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}Ein Mann mit einem zotteligen Bart verneigt sich tief vor dir. Er {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}zittert vor Angst und Ehrfurcht{/d}.{/n} "Gepriesen sei der Imperator, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Ihr erinnert Euch vielleicht gar nicht an mich ..." {n}Er scheint zu hoffen, dass das der Fall ist.{/n} "Ich bin ein Händler von den Gefährten der Leere ... die dank Eurer Güte auf und um Footfall herum überleben konnten ..."
languages.original_text: {n}A man with a scraggly beard bows deeply to you, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}shaking with terror and awe{/d}.{/n} "Glory to the Emperor, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! You might not remember me at all..." {n}He seems to really hope that is the case.{/n} "I'm a merchant from the Fellowship of the Void... which has survived on and around Footfall by your good graces..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Mann mit einem zotteligen Bart verneigt sich tief vor dir. Er zittert vor Angst und Ehrfurcht.{/n} "Gepriesen sei der Imperator, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Ihr erinnert Euch vielleicht gar nicht an mich ..." {n}Er scheint zu hoffen, dass das der Fall ist.{/n} "Ich bin ein Händler von den Gefährten der Leere ... die dank Eurer Güte auf und um Footfall herum überleben konnten ..."
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}Un homme à la barbe hirsute s'incline profondément devant vous, en {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}tremblant de terreur et d'admiration{/d}.{/n} « Gloire à l'Empereur, Votre Seigneurie ! Vous vous souvenez sûrement pas de moi, {n}dit-il d'une façon donnant l'impression qu'il espère que vous l'ayez oublié.{/n} Je suis un marchand de la Communauté du vide... qui a survécu à Castel uniquement grâce à votre bonne volonté. »
languages.original_text: {n}A man with a scraggly beard bows deeply to you, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}shaking with terror and awe{/d}.{/n} "Glory to the Emperor, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! You might not remember me at all..." {n}He seems to really hope that is the case.{/n} "I'm a merchant from the Fellowship of the Void... which has survived on and around Footfall by your good graces..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un homme à la barbe hirsute s'incline profondément devant vous, en tremblant de terreur et d'admiration.{/n} « Gloire à l'Empereur, Votre Seigneurie ! Vous vous souvenez sûrement pas de moi, {n}dit-il d'une façon donnant l'impression qu'il espère que vous l'ayez oublié.{/n} Je suis un marchand de la Communauté du vide... qui a survécu à Castel uniquement grâce à votre bonne volonté. »
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}Karşında {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}korku ve hayranlıkla titreyen{/d}, dağınık sakallı bir adam, yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "İmparator'a şükürler olsun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Beni hatırlamıyor olabilirsiniz." {n}Gerçekten de hatırlamamanı umut ediyor gibi bir hâli var.{/n} "Binliman'da ve çevresinde sizin iyi niyetiniz sayesinde hayatta kalmış Uçsuz Kardeşliği'nden bir tüccarım."
languages.original_text: {n}A man with a scraggly beard bows deeply to you, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}shaking with terror and awe{/d}.{/n} "Glory to the Emperor, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! You might not remember me at all..." {n}He seems to really hope that is the case.{/n} "I'm a merchant from the Fellowship of the Void... which has survived on and around Footfall by your good graces..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Karşında {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaDead}korku ve hayranlıkla titreyen{/d} dağınık sakallı bir adam yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "İmparator'a şükürler olsun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Beni hatırlamıyor olabilirsiniz." {n}Gerçekten de hatırlamamanı umut ediyor gibi bir hâli var.{/n} "Binliman'da ve çevresinde sizin iyi niyetiniz sayesinde hayatta kalan Uçsuz Kardeşliği'nden bir tüccarım."
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor
